**Relevant Ghanaian policies**

- [Ghana National Implementation Plan for the Convention on the Production and Use of Transboundary Water Courses and International Lakes(1992 Water Convention)](https://unece.org/sites/default/files/2021-06/GHANA%20%20NATIONAL%20IMPLEMENTATION%20PLAN%20%20-%201992%20UNECE%20Water%20Convention%20%28FINAL%29_1.pdf) - This Implementation Plan provides for a step by step process for implementation of the 1992 UNECE Water Convention considering the technical, economic and financial capacities of the country, physical and governance framework with specific focus on transboundary management.
